title: GPT-4o with Enhanced Reasoning Capabilities
summary: OpenAI announces improvements to GPT-4o including better multi-step reasoning, enhanced code generation, and new multimodal features for image understanding.
raw_text:
GPT-4o with Enhanced Reasoning Capabilities

We're excited to announce significant improvements to GPT-4o. This update includes:

- Better multi-step reasoning: GPT-4o can now break down complex problems more effectively
- Enhanced code generation: Improved accuracy for Python, JavaScript, and other languages
- New multimodal features: Better understanding of images and documents

These improvements are available immediately to all ChatGPT Plus and API users.
